2: שָׁמַ֣עְתִּי <sup>8085 </sup> <n>I have heard</n> כְאֵ֣לֶּה <sup>428 </sup> <n>such</n> רַבּ֑וֹת <sup>7227 </sup> <n>many such things</n> מְנַחֲמֵ֖י <sup>5162 </sup> <n>comforters</n> עָמָ֣ל <sup>5999 </sup> <n>miserable</n> כֻּלְּכֶֽם׃ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n>
3: הֲקֵ֥ץ <sup>7093 </sup> <n>is there limit</n> לְדִבְרֵי־ <sup>1697 </sup> <n>words</n> ר֑וּחַ <sup>7307 </sup> <n>Shall vain</n> א֥וֹ <sup>176 </sup> <n>and</n> מַה־ <sup>4100 </sup> <n>what</n> יַּ֝מְרִֽיצְךָ֗ <sup>4834 </sup> <n>plagues</n> כִּ֣י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> תַעֲנֶֽה׃ <sup>6030 </sup> <n>thee that thou answerest</n>
4: גַּ֤ם ׀ <sup>1571 </sup> <n>too</n> אָנֹכִי֮ <sup>595 </sup> <n>I</n> כָּכֶ֪ם אֲדַ֫בֵּ֥רָה <sup>1696 </sup> <n>I also could speak</n> ל֤וּ־ <sup>3863 </sup> <n>as ye [do] if</n> יֵ֪שׁ <sup>3426 </sup> <n>were</n> נַפְשְׁכֶ֡ם <sup>5315 </sup> <n>your soul</n> תַּ֤חַת <sup>8478 </sup> <n>your place</n> נַפְשִׁ֗י <sup>5315 </sup> <n>in my soul's</n> אַחְבִּ֣ירָה <sup>2266 </sup> <n>stead I could heap up</n> עֲלֵיכֶ֣ם <sup>5921 </sup> <n>against</n> בְּמִלִּ֑ים <sup>4405 </sup> <n>words</n> וְאָנִ֥יעָה <sup>5128 </sup> <n>against you and shake</n> עֲ֝לֵיכֶ֗ם <sup>5921 </sup> <n>against</n> בְּמ֣וֹ <sup>1119 </sup> <n>at</n> רֹאשִֽׁי׃ <sup>7218 </sup> <n>mine head</n>
5: אֲאַמִּצְכֶ֥ם <sup>553 </sup> <n>[But] I would strengthen</n> בְּמוֹ־ <sup>1119 </sup> <n>you with</n> פִ֑י <sup>6310 </sup> <n>my mouth</n> וְנִ֖יד <sup>5205 </sup> <n>and the moving</n> שְׂפָתַ֣י <sup>8193 </sup> <n>of my lips</n> יַחְשֹֽׂךְ׃ <sup>2820 </sup> <n>should asswage</n>
6: אִֽם־ <sup>518 </sup> <n>If</n> אֲ֭דַבְּרָה <sup>1696 </sup> <n>Though I speak</n> לֹא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>is not</n> יֵחָשֵׂ֣ךְ <sup>2820 </sup> <n>is not asswaged</n> כְּאֵבִ֑י <sup>3511 </sup> <n>my grief</n> וְ֝אַחְדְּלָ֗ה <sup>2308 </sup> <n>and [though] I forbear</n> מַה־ <sup>4100 </sup> <n>what</n> מִנִּ֥י <sup>4480 </sup> <n>at</n> יַהֲלֹֽךְ׃ <sup>1980 </sup> <n>what am I eased</n>
7: אַךְ־ <sup>389 </sup> <n>but</n> עַתָּ֥ה <sup>6258 </sup> <n>now</n> הֶלְאָ֑נִי <sup>3811 </sup> <n>But now he hath made me weary</n> הֲ֝שִׁמּ֗וֹתָ <sup>8074 </sup> <n>thou hast made desolate</n> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> עֲדָתִֽי׃ <sup>5712 </sup> <n>all my company</n>
8: וַֽ֭תִּקְמְטֵנִי <sup>7059 </sup> <n>And thou hast filled me with wrinkles</n> לְעֵ֣ד <sup>5707 </sup> <n>[which] is a witness</n> הָיָ֑ה <sup>1961 </sup> <n>has become</n> וַיָּ֥קָם <sup>6965 </sup> <n>rising up</n> בִּ֥י כַ֝חֲשִׁ֗י <sup>3585 </sup> <n>[against me] and my leanness</n> בְּפָנַ֥י <sup>6440 </sup> <n>to my face</n> יַעֲנֶֽה׃ <sup>6030 </sup> <n>in me beareth witness</n>
9: אַפּ֤וֹ <sup>639 </sup> <n>[me] in his wrath</n> טָרַ֨ף ׀ <sup>2963 </sup> <n>He teareth</n> וַֽיִּשְׂטְמֵ֗נִי <sup>7852 </sup> <n>who hateth</n> חָרַ֣ק <sup>2786 </sup> <n>me he gnasheth</n> עָלַ֣י <sup>5921 </sup> <n>with</n> בְּשִׁנָּ֑יו <sup>8127 </sup> <n>upon me with his teeth</n> צָרִ֓י ׀ <sup>6862 </sup> <n>mine enemy</n> יִלְט֖וֹשׁ <sup>3913 </sup> <n>sharpeneth</n> עֵינָ֣יו <sup>5869 </sup> <n>his eyes</n> לִֽי׃
10: פָּעֲר֬וּ <sup>6473 </sup> <n>They have gaped</n> עָלַ֨י ׀ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>against</n> בְּפִיהֶ֗ם <sup>6310 </sup> <n>upon me with their mouth</n> בְּ֭חֶרְפָּה <sup>2781 </sup> <n>reproachfully</n> הִכּ֣וּ <sup>5221 </sup> <n>they have smitten</n> לְחָיָ֑י <sup>3895 </sup> <n>me upon the cheek</n> יַ֝֗חַד <sup>3162 </sup> <n>themselves together</n> עָלַ֥י <sup>5921 </sup> <n>against</n> יִתְמַלָּאֽוּן׃ <sup>4390 </sup> <n>they have gathered</n>
11: יַסְגִּירֵ֣נִי <sup>5462 </sup> <n>hath delivered</n> אֵ֭ל <sup>410 </sup> <n>God</n> אֶ֣ל <sup>413 </sup> <n>to</n> עֲוִ֑יל <sup>5760 </sup> <n>me to the ungodly</n> וְעַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>into</n> יְדֵ֖י <sup>3027 </sup> <n>into the hands</n> רְשָׁעִ֣ים <sup>7563 </sup> <n>of the wicked</n> יִרְטֵֽנִי׃ <sup>3399 </sup> <n>and turned me over</n>
12: שָׁ֘לֵ֤ו <sup>7961 </sup> <n>I was at ease</n> הָיִ֨יתִי ׀ <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> וַֽיְפַרְפְּרֵ֗נִי <sup>6565 </sup> <n>but he hath broken me asunder</n> וְאָחַ֣ז <sup>270 </sup> <n>he hath also taken</n> בְּ֭עָרְפִּי <sup>6203 </sup> <n>[me] by my neck</n> וַֽיְפַצְפְּצֵ֑נִי <sup>6327 </sup> <n>and shaken me to pieces</n> וַיְקִימֵ֥נִי <sup>6965 </sup> <n>and set me up</n> ל֝֗וֹ לְמַטָּרָֽה׃ <sup>4307 </sup> <n>for his mark</n>
13: יָ֘סֹ֤בּוּ <sup>5437 </sup> <n>compass me round about</n> עָלַ֨י ׀ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>and</n> רַבָּ֗יו <sup>7228 </sup> <n>His archers</n> יְפַלַּ֣ח <sup>6398 </sup> <n>asunder</n> כִּ֭לְיוֹתַי <sup>3629 </sup> <n>my reins</n> וְלֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>Without</n> יַחְמ֑וֹל <sup>2550 </sup> <n>and doth not spare</n> יִשְׁפֹּ֥ךְ <sup>8210 </sup> <n>he poureth out</n> לָ֝אָ֗רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>upon the ground</n> מְרֵרָֽתִי׃ <sup>4845 </sup> <n>my gall</n>
14: יִפְרְצֵ֣נִי <sup>6555 </sup> <n>He breaketh</n> פֶ֭רֶץ <sup>6556 </sup> <n>me with breach</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>up</n> פְּנֵי־ <sup>6440 </sup> <n>upon</n> פָ֑רֶץ <sup>6556 </sup> <n>breach</n> יָרֻ֖ץ <sup>7323 </sup> <n>he runneth</n> עָלַ֣י <sup>5921 </sup> <n>and</n> כְּגִבּֽוֹר׃ <sup>1368 </sup> <n>upon me like a giant</n>
15: שַׂ֣ק <sup>8242 </sup> <n>sackcloth</n> תָּ֭פַרְתִּי <sup>8609 </sup> <n>I have sewed</n> עֲלֵ֣י <sup>5921 </sup> <n>over</n> גִלְדִּ֑י <sup>1539 </sup> <n>upon my skin</n> וְעֹלַ֖לְתִּי <sup>5953 </sup> <n>and defiled</n> בֶעָפָ֣ר <sup>6083 </sup> <n>in the dust</n> קַרְנִֽי׃ <sup>7161 </sup> <n>my horn</n>

17: עַ֭ל <sup>5921 </sup> <n>Although</n> לֹא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>is no</n> חָמָ֣ס <sup>2555 </sup> <n>Not for [any] injustice</n> בְּכַפָּ֑י <sup>3709 </sup> <n>in mine hands</n> וּֽתְפִלָּתִ֥י <sup>8605 </sup> <n>also my prayer</n> זַכָּֽה׃ <sup>2134 </sup> <n>[is] pure</n>
18: אֶ֭רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>O earth</n> אַל־ <sup>408 </sup> <n>and Let there be no</n> תְּכַסִּ֣י <sup>3680 </sup> <n>cover</n> דָמִ֑י <sup>1818 </sup> <n>not thou my blood</n> וְֽאַל־ <sup>408 </sup> <n>and Let there be no</n> יְהִ֥י <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> מָ֝ק֗וֹם <sup>4725 </sup> <n>have no place</n> לְזַעֲקָתִֽי׃ <sup>2201 </sup> <n>and let my cry</n>
